about_the_game: The Notes for Memory DLC contains several nice bonuses to the Memory Note game. By pressing the "Digress" button in the game, you can exercis your eyes (you’ll see how;)) or train your memory in the find a pair mini-game to get a little closer to the main character of the game!
detailed_description: The Notes for Memory DLC contains several nice bonuses to the Memory Note game. By pressing the "Digress" button in the game, you can exercis your eyes (you’ll see how;)) or train your memory in the find a pair mini-game to get a little closer to the main character of the game!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Notes for Memory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel atom Z3xx (Silvermont)
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series. 1280x720 or better required
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit ver)
  • Processor: Core i5 of Ivy Bridge generation or better or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 2096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Nvidia (VRAM 1GB or better). Recommended 1920x1080
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound

short_description: Notes for Memory contains bonuses to the Memory Note game. You can exercise your eyes or train your memory in the find a pair mini-game to get a little closer to the main character of the game!
